--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"ImplementationGuide","id":"54b17200-d58a-40ab-a2ae-bdf044be7bb9","url":"http://hl7.org/fhir/us/daf","version":"0","name":"Data Access Framework (DAF)","status":"draft","experimental":false,"date":"2015-01-01T08:00:00+08:00","publisher":"ONC / HL7 Joint Access Framework (DAF) Initiative leverages the HL7 FHIR standards to standardize access to Meaningful Use Stage 2 structured information both within the organization and from external organizations","jurisdiction":[{"coding":[{"system":"urn:iso:std:iso:3166","code":"US"}]}],"copyright":"Published by ONC under the standard FHIR license (CC0)","packageId":"hl7.fhir.us.daf","license":"CC0-1.0","fhirVersion":["4.0.1"],"dependsOn":[{"uri":"http://hl7.org/fhir/ImplementationGuide/uscore"}],"global":[{"type":"Patient","profile":"http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/patient"}],"definition":{"grouping":[{"name":"test","description":"Base package (not broken up into multiple packages)"}],"resource":[{"reference":{"reference":"Patient/test"},"name":"Test Example","description":"A test example to show how an implementation guide works","exampleCanonical":"http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/patient"}],"page":{"nameUrl":"patient-example.html","title":"Example Patient Page","generation":"html","page":[{"nameUrl":"list.html","title":"Value Set x-codeSamples.label: cURL
javascript Axios

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: A type of use context assigned to the implementation guide

parameters.name: context-type-quantity
parameters.description: A use context type and quantity- or range-based value assigned to the implementation guide

parameters.name: context-type-value
parameters.description: A use context type and value assigned to the implementation guide

parameters.name: depends-on
parameters.description: Identity of the IG that this depends on

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the implementation guide

parameters.name: experimental
parameters.description: For testing purposes, not real usage

parameters.name: global
parameters.description: Profile that all resources must conform to

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Intended jurisdiction for the implementation guide

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the implementation guide

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the implementation guide

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the implementation guide

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The human-friendly name of the implementation guide

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the implementation guide

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the implementation guide

resource.name: Data Access Framework (DAF)
resource.description: The Data Access Framework (DAF) Initiative leverages the HL7 FHIR standards to standardize access to Meaningful Use Stage 2 structured information both within the organization and from external organizations
resource.copyright: Published by ONC under the standard FHIR license (CC0)
